description: Describes read permissions for a Amazon Q App in Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q App for which to retrieve permissions.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q App for which permissions are returned.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q App for which permissions are returned.

nested_items.name: permissions
nested_items.description: The list of permissions granted for the Amazon Q App.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action associated with the permission.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal user to which the permission applies.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the user.

nested_items.name: email
nested_items.description: The email address associated with the user.
